text: Andrea Agnelli (born December 6, 1975 in Turin) is an Italian businessman. In 2010 he became president of Italian football club Juventus F.C.. He is an Executive Member of the European Club Association. He is also a board member of FIAT and Exor. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Italian businesspeople Category:People from Turin
title: Andrea Agnelli
